context: This was one of the significant cases against Trump, with a threat of criminal charges - but the prosecutor doesn't seem to have enough evidence for the AG to support a criminal case. But the Civil case is also a deadly blow to Trump - threatening ALL his business and properties in NY - so he MUST settle.  It's within his means financially - and the RISK, moreso than the cost, demands he settle.  Word is the Trump team already made an offer.
